title: Can You Feel a Maker’s Heart Through Their Art?
itunes:title: Can You Feel a Maker’s Heart Through Their Art?
description:
Have you ever picked up, looked at or listened to something so beautiful, it left you in a state of awe? And then thought… I wonder what the person who made it is like? Is what I’m looking at just an extension of their heart and soul? And, if that soul is dark, will you […]The post Can You Feel a Maker’s Heart Through Their Art? appeared first on Good LifeProject.
